artifacts.name: Inexhaustible Cart of Lumber
artifacts.description: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Wood per day

artifacts.name: Inexhaustible Cart of Ore
artifacts.description: When equipped, this cart provides you with an additional +1 Ore per day

artifacts.name: Ladybird of Luck
artifacts.description: The Ladybird of Luck increases your Luck by +1

artifacts.description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 2nd level units (in that town) by 5 per week

artifacts.description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 3rd level units (in that town) by 4 per week

artifacts.name: Mystic Orb of Mana
artifacts.description: This orb helps you recover 3 extra spell points per day

artifacts.name: Orb of Driving Rain
artifacts.description: This powerful orb causes your Water spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

artifacts.name: Orb of Inhibition
artifacts.description: This powerful orb prevents all spell casting in combat

artifacts.name: Orb of Silt
artifacts.description: This powerful orb causes your Earth spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

artifacts.name: Orb of Tempestuous Fire
artifacts.description: This powerful orb causes your Fire spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

artifacts.name: Orb of the Firmament
artifacts.description: This powerful orb causes your Air spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

artifacts.name: Orb of Vulnerability
artifacts.description: During combat, this orb negates the natural magic resistance of all creatures on the battlefield

artifacts.name: Shackles of War
artifacts.description: When these shackles are wielded in combat, neither you nor your opponent may retreat or surrender

artifacts.name: Speculum
artifacts.description: The Speculum increases your Scouting radius by +1

artifacts.name: Sphere of Permanence
artifacts.description: Wielding this sphere renders your units immune to the Dispel spell

artifacts.name: Spirit of Oppression
artifacts.description: This item negates all morale bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent

artifacts.name: Spyglass
artifacts.description: The Spyglass increases your Scouting radius by +1

artifacts.name: Stoic Watchman
artifacts.description: This figurine increases your Eagle Eye skill by 10%

artifacts.name: Talisman of Mana
artifacts.description: This talisman helps you recover 2 extra spell points per day

artifacts.name: Tome of Air Magic
artifacts.description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Air Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

artifacts.name: Tome of Earth Magic
artifacts.description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Earth Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

artifacts.name: Tome of Fire Magic
artifacts.description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Fire Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

artifacts.name: Tome of Water Magic
artifacts.description: This heavy book contains all spells in the school of Water Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

artifacts.name: Torso of Legion
artifacts.description: This item, when equipped by a hero in a town, increases the growth of your 4th level units (in that town) by 3 per week

artifacts.name: Vial of Lifeblood
artifacts.description: This item increases the health of all your units by +2

artifacts.name: Spellbook
artifacts.description: Allows the hero to cast spells. Can be bought in mage guilds

artifacts.name: Spell Scroll
artifacts.description: Allows the hero to cast the Spell scroll's spell as long as the scroll is in an accessory slot

artifacts.name: Grail
artifacts.description: Allows the hero to build a special building in one of the player's towns. Can be found with the help of the puzzle map. On some maps getting the Grail is a victory condition

artifacts.name: Catapult
artifacts.description: Every hero has one by default. Attacks fortifications during siege

artifacts.name: Ballista
artifacts.description: Can be bought in some towns' blacksmith. Attacks enemies during combat

artifacts.name: Ammo Cart
artifacts.description: Can be bought in some towns' blacksmith. Gives ranged creatures infinite ammo during combat

artifacts.name: First Aid Tent
artifacts.description: Can be bought in some towns' blacksmith. Heals friendly creatures during combat

artifacts.name: Pandora's Box
artifacts.description: It can only appear on the adventure map and can't be placed into heroes' inventories. Can give experience, skills, artifacts, spells or creatures, give or take away resources, luck, morale or spell points. Often guarded by various creatures

artifacts.name: Armageddon's Blade
artifacts.description: This right handed weapon gives +3 attack, +3 defense, +6 knowledge, +3 spellpower, also gives the hero the Armageddon spell and renders the hero's army immune to the Armageddon spell

artifacts.name: Vial of Dragon Blood
artifacts.description: his item gives +5 attack and +5 defense to all dragons under the hero's command

artifacts.name: Admiral's Hat
artifacts.description: Worn on the head this item removes movement penalties for boarding or unboarding a boat

artifacts.name: Angelic Alliance
artifacts.description: This right handed weapon allows Rampart, Tower, Fortress, Stronghold, and Castle creatures to be mixed without a morale penalty and casts the Prayer spell at the start of every combat

artifacts.name: Armor of the Damned
artifacts.description: Worn on the torso, this armor casts Slow, Weakness, Misfortune and Curse on the enemy at the start of every battle. The effect lasts for fifty turns

artifacts.name: Bow of the Sharpshooter
artifacts.description: This item lets ranged creatures shoot while adjacent to enemies, and allows them to do full damage regardless of range or obstacles

artifacts.name: Cloak of the Undead King
artifacts.description: Worn about the shoulders, this cloak gives a 30% boost to the hero's Necromancy skill. Also allows the hero to raise walking dead, wights, and liches after winning battles

artifacts.name: Cornucopia
artifacts.description: This item generates four of each precious resource (gems, crystal, mercury, and sulfur) every day

artifacts.name: Elixir of Life
artifacts.description: This item gives all creatures, apart from undead or unliving ones, +25% hit points and the regeneration ability

artifacts.name: Power of the Dragon Father
artifacts.description: This armor gives +6 to all primary skills, and all troops in the hero's army are immune to spells below fifth level

artifacts.name: Ring of the Magi
artifacts.description: Worn on a finger, this ring adds fifty rounds to spell duration

artifacts.name: Statue of Legion
artifacts.description: This item increases creature production in all towns by 50%

artifacts.name: Titan's Thunder
artifacts.description: This right handed weapon gives a total of +9 to a hero's attack and defense skill, and +8 to their spell power and knowledge. Also gives a free spell book with the unique Titan's Lightning Bolt spell

artifacts.name: Wizard's Well
artifacts.description: This item regenerates all of the hero's spell points every day
